sources.title: Mujeres Salvajes ( 1984) 1080p
sources.description: NOW IN HD AND WIDESCREEN RESTORED VERSION ADULTS ONLY! 18+   WARNING: THEMES OF SEXUAL VIOLENCE, DEPICTIONS OF SEXUAL  ABUSE, TORTURE AND SEXUAL CONTENT!  Plot: Six women murderers escape from prison to dug out a gold treasure buried in the woods, but six male campers are sitting on it. Birds get shot, women and men get shot, and the prize goes to the surviving few.
